channel.title: Admins cannot trade
channel.description:
how do i make it so that admins cannot trade. if you can do this (make it so they can trade other admins or higher rights.) also.
i have searched but they all seemed to be for delta and i think its a different code and place.
i tryed to add but i just got spammed when i logged in "admins cannot trade" so i deleted.
anyone help, thanks,
~ luke.

item.title: Admins cannot trade
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if i add i just get spammed admins cannot trade.

if (playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Sorry admins can't trade"); }
and this:

if (playerRights <= 1) { }

Read full topic

item.title: Admins cannot trade
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Find where the trading packet is handled and use an if statement to check the rights of the player who is trading and the player who is being traded to ensure that neither of them are admins.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins cannot trade
item.dc:creator: @Beast43 Beast43
item.description:
@Beast43 wrote:

huh go in client.java search whatever it says when admins try to trade and remove it.

item.title: Admins cannot trade

What the Fack?

stop talkin trash.[/quote]
